references.paper_title: A new definition of alzheimer's disease: a hippocampal dementia
references.reason: Provides a foundational definition of Alzheimer's disease, a key concept relevant to the paper's real-world application in brain MRI analysis.
Introduces a fundamental mathematical framework for linear programming, a technique relevant to the paper's proposed Attention boosted Individualized Regression model.
Presents varying-coefficient models, a precursor to the paper's individualized modeling approach, establishing the basis for the novel method.
Provides a comprehensive study of varying-coefficient models, directly informing the paper's focus on individualized regression and its associated techniques.
Introduces the self-attention mechanism, a core component of the paper's proposed model and a key element of the model's name and conceptual foundation.
